title: I got a free Icon?
body: I just got a a rammus icon yesterday and I didnt buy it and I've never seen it, whats going on? thanks

replies.body:
Supposed to be given to players who played during Beta (along with King Rammus skin).

If that's not you then its probably a bug and will be taken off you when they find out LOL
oh lol, I was in the beta so maybe it was just late or something :P
Say what? You played Beta about 6 years ago and only now got the skin?
6 years of the same thing 0.0... is he in the top 200 players for the longest overall duration played yet
Why are you so mean? I was just wondering how he got a skin that was awarded to beta players after such a long time.
most people I met have never gone longer than 3 years on a single game. I was surprised. I mean, 6 years, for a casual player? That's a first time see for me.

I have been playing this game now for... 4-5 years or something, hang on, let me check.

Yeh best I can find is my first email from Riot back in 2011. 4 years myself and I while I took a break recently, maybe a few months or more, so mostly 4 years.
0.0 meeting people more than 3 years now. Wonder how many I can meet.

http://wasted-on-lol.com/stats/oce/asianhello/

He's not as dedicated as most of the proper league players :P
